Title: Ethan Frome
Actors: Liam Neeson, Gil Rood, Tate Donovan, Stephen Mendillo
Plot: Based on the novel of the same name by Edith Wharton, it is about a husband and wife (Ethan and Zeena), who need an extra hand around the house due to Zeena's debilitated body and constant illness. The young woman who joins them is a beautiful, spirited person. She and Ethan fall in love much to the dismay of Zeena.
